meaningMnemonic: Play your <radical>drum</radical> under the <radical>moon</radical> and your <radical>hair</radical> will <kanji>swell</kanji>! The more you play and the longer it's under the moon, the larger your hair will swell.
readingMnemonic: Using this method, your hair <kanji>swell</kanji>s so much it looks like a giant <reading>bow</reading>ling (ぼう) ball is sitting on top of your head. It's all round, and well... swollen is probably the only word that fits.
